item.title: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 Character Pass 3 announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Featuring Rob Lucci (CP0), Enel, King, Z, and more.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Omega Force have announced One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 Character Pass 3, which will consist of six new playable characters released via two character packs. It will become available for purchase on August 11.

Here are the details:

  • Downloadable Content #6: ??? Pack (fall 2025)
    • Additional playable characters
      • Rob Lucci (CP0)
      • ???
      • ???
    • Additional character costumes (x3)
  • Downloadable Content #8: Special Selection Pack (early 2026)
    • Additional playable characters
      • Enel
      • King
      • Z
  • Character Pass 3 Purchase Bonus
    • Shanks additional technique “Kamusari” (usable by both Shanks and Shanks (Film: Red)).

One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 is available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, and is coming soon to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series.

Watch a new trailer below.

Character Pass 3 Announce Trailer
